mosquito_genera.name: Anopheles gambiae
features: Distinct_physical_features: Long and slender abdomen, Pale wings
Larval_behaviour: Rests parallel to water surface
Flight_range: Short, within a few kilometers

mosquito_genera.name: Aedes aegypti
features: Larval_behaviour: Rests just below water surface
Flight_range: Can travel up to several hundred meters

mosquito_genera.name: Culex pipiens
features: Distinct_physical_features: Brownish body with pale scales
Larval_breeding_areas: Standing water in various environments
Larval_behaviour: Rests parallel to water surface

mosquito_genera.name: Aedes albopictus
features: Distinct_physical_features: Black and white striped legs
Larval_breeding_areas: Artificial containers and natural habitats
Larval_behaviour: Rests just below water surface
Flight_range: Can travel several hundred meters

mosquito_genera.name: Culex quinquefasciatus
features: Larval_breeding_areas: Standing water, septic tanks, and cesspools
Larval_behaviour: Rests parallel to water surface

mosquito_genera.name: Aedes triseriatus
features: Distinct_physical_features: Silver-scaled body, White bands on legs
Larval_breeding_areas: Tree holes and artificial containers
Larval_behaviour: Rests just below water surface
Flight_range: Can travel several hundred meters

mosquito_genera.name: Culiseta melanura
features: Distinct_physical_features: Dark body with pale bands on proboscis
Larval_behaviour: Rests parallel to water surface
